Title: White Sauce? Hot Sauce?
Writer: Grant Morrison (developed by), Brian Taylor (developed by), Peter Macmanus (teleplay by), Matthew White (executive story editor), Ken Kristensen (story editor), Grant Morrison (based on the comic by)
Actors: Christopher Meloni, Ritchie Coster, Lili Mirojnick, Medina Senghore
Plot: Sax and Happy go separate ways following a destructive family reunion; Merry is under investigation by Internal Affairs; and Hailey and children are introduced to a far more terrifying prison.
